name: Pepoland: The Stoned Wars - Gangsta Life Simulator
name_original: Pepoland: The Stoned Wars - Gangsta Life Simulator
description:
Game info:
Streets are filled with madness! Everyone is eager to grab onto his piece and prove his superiority (to become the most powerful gangsta in the world). Immerse yourself in a world of insanity, trash and an endless war for power in a new game from CodeBits.

Create your criminal business in Chelopundriya and prove to everyone that you are worthy to be the new king of the streets. At your disposal a huge selection of customization for your character, an exciting story, dozens of mini-games, online PVP with another players and much more. The most realistic gangsta life simulator on your smartphone!

Key features:
- Create and develop your unique hero and be the most powerful gangsta on the streets!
- Cook and distribute candies to make money and expand your crime business.
- Explore new opportunities and customize your interior to show your crime autority!
- Fight with dozens of unique enemies and bosses.
- Complete assignments and pass a fascinating storyline.
- Many unique mini-games and interesting quests.
- Fight with another player in online PVP-mode.
- Sounded and live characters.
- Beautiful cartoon graphics with fun animations.
- Buy a new weapons, armors and another gangsta equipment in the most realistic crime life simulator!
- Meet with another players in the game chat.

Additional Features:
- You didn't have a Wi-Fi or internet connection? Don't worry! You can play in our game at offline mode.
- Enjoy new game experience with different game mechanics: tap-tap (clicker), role-playing (RPG), online PVP fights and life simulator!
- You don't need pay to win. You can earn money and marks in the game quests, fights and mini-games.
- Connect CodeBits Cloud saving and play everywhere on different devices.
- Pepoland: The Stoned Wars has optimized HD graphics for the best gaming experience.

Information:
This game is replete with content that is only for adults. We do not carry the goal of offending or humiliating anyone. This work is created exclusively for entertainment purposes and has a satirical character. All coincidences with real personalities, events and places are pure coincidence.
